about_the_game:
《Star Odyssey》 is a strategy pigeon game where you control planets, destroy monsters, challenge bosses, buy power-ups, and survive!

Game Features:

Open the Workshop to design characters, monsters, and props!

  • Fast-paced (less than 20 minutes per game), auto-save games, and start a game anytime, anywhere!

  • There are dozens of planets to choose from, and various mechanics are waiting for you to explore!

  • Hundreds of props for you to choose from, props can be freely combined and linked to form a powerful build (shield flow, escape flow, anti-injury flow, charm flow, special effect flow)!

  • Each wave of enemy attacks lasts for 20~60 seconds, and the game rhythm is relaxed and entertaining!

  • Destroy monsters to pick up coins, and open random shops to buy items at any time!

  • A large number of unique monsters, bosses, and emergencies make every game a unique experience!

  • A variety of difficulties are available to challenge, and the amount of play is full!

  • Open the Workshop to design characters, monsters, and props!

At last:

Thank you to everyone who supported this game

name: Star Odyssey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: 《Star Odyssey》 is a 2D strategy space shooter Roguelike game in which you play as a planet in the universe, choose a variety of props with different effects, progress, build unique builds, and survive and conquer in the interstellar arena with wits and courage.
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
